scripts.test:e2e: HOST=127.0.0.1 PORT=8000 npx http-server . -p 8000 -c-1 --silent & server_pid=$!; sleep 1; npx playwright test; code=$?; if kill -0 $server_pid 2>/dev/null; then kill $server_pid; wait $server_pid 2>/dev/null; fi; exit $code
scripts.test:e2e:headed: HOST=127.0.0.1 PORT=8000 npx http-server . -p 8000 -c-1 --silent & server_pid=$!; sleep 1; npx playwright test --headed; code=$?; if kill -0 $server_pid 2>/dev/null; then kill $server_pid; wait $server_pid 2>/dev/null; fi; exit $code
